# Control Flow Exercise







## Meaw 

`meaw()`: using for loop


::: {.cell}

```{.python .cell-code}
def meaw(n):
    for _ in range(n):
        print("Meaw")
```
:::


let's print "meaw" 3 times


::: {.cell}

```{.python .cell-code}
meaw(3)
#> Meaw
#> Meaw
#> Meaw
```
:::


`meaw()`: pythonista way


::: {.cell}

```{.python .cell-code}
def meaw(n):
    print("Meaw\n" * n, end="")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.python .cell-code}
meaw(4)
#> Meaw
#> Meaw
#> Meaw
#> Meaw
```
:::



## Hogwarts 

### List of Students


::: {.cell}

```{.python .cell-code}
students = ["Hermione", "Harry", "Ron"]
students
#> ['Hermione', 'Harry', 'Ron']
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.python .cell-code}
for student in students:
    print(student)
#> Hermione
#> Harry
#> Ron
```
:::


### Dictionary of Students


::: {.cell}

```{.python .cell-code}
students = [
    {"name": "Hermione", "house": "Gryffindor", "patronus": "Otter"},
    {"name": "Harry", "house": "Gryffindor", "patronous": "Stag"},
    {"name": "Draco", "house": "Slytherin", "patronous": None}
]
```
:::


Iterate though array of student (row by row)


::: {.cell}

```{.python .cell-code}
for student in students:
    print(student["name"], student["house"], sep=", ")
#> Hermione, Gryffindor
#> Harry, Gryffindor
#> Draco, Slytherin
```
:::


Define a function to print information from each student


::: {.cell}

```{.python .cell-code}
def print_student_info(i):
    print("Student No.", i + 1)
    for k, v in students[i].items() :
        print("- ", k, ": ", v)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.python .cell-code}
print_student_info(0)
#> Student No. 1
#> -  name :  Hermione
#> -  house :  Gryffindor
#> -  patronus :  Otter
```
:::



Now, print information from all students


::: {.cell}

```{.python .cell-code}
for i in  range(len(students)):
    print_student_info(i)
#> Student No. 1
#> -  name :  Hermione
#> -  house :  Gryffindor
#> -  patronus :  Otter
#> Student No. 2
#> -  name :  Harry
#> -  house :  Gryffindor
#> -  patronous :  Stag
#> Student No. 3
#> -  name :  Draco
#> -  house :  Slytherin
#> -  patronous :  None
```
:::
